title: Riavere elo back
body:
ur server had hard problem in date 3/08/2015.
I lost 2 games cause in the first one 2 poeple couldn t play, and in the second one cause i couldn  t play in person.
I just wanna my 40 points back cause it s cause ur server problems that the game wasn t right.
At least i wanna u explain the reason of that problem.

replies.body:
This is the italian forum you can only talk about pizza, mafia, mandolino and spaghetti, but only sometimes about spaghetti.
By the way, in my opinion you were really unlucky about the first game, but you also were really tard about the second game, i mean why did you even play if you know that there were problems with the servers?

cause no tiket and cause the lag stopped....and btw the problem is still here...and a lot of people from my clan too have this problem...what should we do? reintall lol? ora we just have to wait? if rito maybe can wake up will be great

> [{quoted}](name=orphen90,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=qKVcGE2I,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-03T14:30:50.915+0000)
>
> cause no tiket and cause the lag stopped....and btw the problem is still here...and a lot of people from my clan too have this problem...what should we do? reintall lol? ora we just have to wait? if rito maybe can wake up will be great

Damn its a free game, just wait till the problem is solved.
And if you are so addicted to this game you should have a break.
i had the same issue two weeks ago. they dont wanna give me back my points, i win a game where i get dc on last 7-8 minutes and i get a penalization of 26 points
